meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lauren Krohn Erhard Konerding Chris Goheen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2246.

td.p: Lauren Krohn, a medical lab technician originally from Washington, D.C.
Erhard Konerding, a librarian & instructor from Middletown, Connecticut
Chris Goheen, a chemical engineer originally from Champaign, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,900)

tr.td: HISTORIC NAMES
POP SONGS
ANNUAL EVENTS
WEATHER
THE DINNER TABLE
LEFTOVERS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_4', 'clue_J_5_4_stuck', '(Erhard: What are name place settings?)
(Lauren: What are place settings?)
(Chris: What are name placards?)
[Laughter]
(Alex: They are called [*], so there\'ll be no harm, no foul on that one. We\'re not going to give it to any one of you because you were all around it but no one was specific enough, but place settings include the knife, the fork, and the glasses and the plate, not just the card which is what we were going for.)

place cards

ChrisErhardLauren
Triple Stumper
')
